name: RevolutionGames
description: Revolution Games is a sports based community token developed mainly to create a safe heaven for sports lovers. Our main goal is to provide people a safe and trustworthy place where they can use their crypto for rewards, fantasy sports & sports ticketing. As a sports community developed token, we focus on the needs of our Sports lover community members. Revolution Games is an upcoming next level online sports ticketing platform, aimed at bringing cryptocurrency and smart contract-based protocols to the mainstream. The platform utilizes the Binance Smart Chain for transactions, giving unprecedented flexibility and speed on transactions executions. BSC is an most advance blockchain solution for smart Contract that allows low fee and fast transaction
